info.line1: There is no multi language on the server yet
info.line2: Therefore the content is not fully translated

info.warning: Attention, the project is still in development, there is no adaptation, optimization or serious business logic, refactoring is needed in some places =)
info.admin:
You are an - Administrator, your task is to regulate prices for products and their assortment, as well as monitor the statistics of "Crafters".
You can also add new users, including administrators.
You can add new products and edit existing ones, but you cannot create or interact with crafter orders in any way.
info.crafter:
You are a - Crafter, your task is to accept customer orders, creating them in the system. There is a guide to creating an order on the orders page.
You create burgers and accompanying products for the order, edit them if necessary, and change order statuses so that customers can track their orders.
You have access to the product interface for reference information, but you can't influence the price or create a new product.

orders.info:
Directory
You can cancel an order only while it is in the "Accepted" status.
Orders are deleted at the end of the working day.
When editing an existing order, the burgers are changed immediately.
When changing the order condition to "Ready", a bell sound is made (for the client) when canceling, there is also a characteristic sound.
